722600f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722600f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between Wast 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is the court (rear) side of the eastern unit of the Hudson View Garden
Apartments. This building faces directly onto Pinehurst Ave., with a
private driveway at its rear; that separates it from the west wing.
1925.
Irving Underhill.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722596f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722596f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is the private driveway between buildings of the Hudson View Gardens.
The unit on the right frenting onte Pinehurst Ave; the other (left) ort o
Northern Ave. See other views.
August 1925.
Gift of E.M. Jenks.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

722606f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722606f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is one of the doorways of the Hudson View Garden Apartments.
1925.
Irving Underhill.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722602f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722602f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streeta.
Shown is the northern portion of the west unit of the Hudson View Garden
Apartments. In actuality these buildings depicted face onto Northern Av.
1925.
Irving Underhill.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722598f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722598f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st to 187th Streets. This
view is southward; and shows the eastern unit, (left) which faces onbe Pine-
hurst Ave; separated by a private driveway, from the western (right); which
fronts onee Northern Ave.  Buildings shown on the extreme right, faces on-
4eeRiverside Drive (1 block further west of Northern Ave).
1925.
Irving Underhill.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722597f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722597f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is the private driveway that separates the units of the Hudson View
Garden Apartments.  The east unit on the right fronting onto Pinehurst
Ave., at West 183rd Street; the west (left) onto Northern Ave. This view
is northward.
1925.
Irving Underhill.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722604f.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722604f.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown thru the arches, is one of the buildings comprising the east unit of
the Hudson View 8arden Apartments.
1925.
Gift of E.M. Jenks.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

722603f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722603f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is the northern portion of the west unit of the Hudson View Garden
Apartments, with Riverside Drive, Hudson River and the Jersey Palisades in
the background.
1925.
Gift of E.M. Jenks.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

722595f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722595f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., south from West 181st Street.
November 18, 1936.
W.P.A. Photo.
Federal Art Project.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.

722599f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722599f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Stree s.
Shown is the northern unit of the Hudson View Garden Apartments, as viewed
from the private driveway between buildings, and at the west of Pinehurst Ave.
1925.
Gift of E.M. Jenks.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.

722605f-a.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722605f-a.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between West 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is one of the arched entrances from the Avenue, to the Hudson View
Garden Apartments.
1925.
Cift of E.M. Jenks.
MAY BE REPPODUCED.

722601f.title: Manhattan: Pinehurst Avenue - 181st Street (West)
722601f.text:
Pinehurst Ave., west side, between Wwst 181st and 187th Streets.
Shown is the central tower of the Hudson View Garden Apartments, located on
the highest point in Manhattan,(400 feet above sea levell.
1925.
Gift of E.M. Jenka.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
